patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,21 @@
+
+name: Java CI with Maven
+on:
+  push:
+    branches : [manager]
+  pull_request:
+    branches : [manager]
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+
+    steps:
+    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+    - name: Set up JDK 11
+      uses: actions/setup-java@v1
+      with:
+        java-version: 11
+    - name: Build with Maven
+      run: mvn -B -e verify
